exceptions.tactic: apply compose2_1IsPR with (f := f) (g := ignoreParams n m).
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m : nat f : naryFunc n H : isPR n f IHm : isPR (m + n) (ignoreParams n m f) The term "f" has type "naryFunc n" while it is expected to have type "nat -> nat -> nat".
The reference IHm was not found in the current environment.

original: intros n m f H. induction m. - unfold ignoreParams. simpl. auto. - unfold ignoreParams. simpl. apply compose2_1IsPR with (f := f) (g := ignoreParams n m). apply IHm.
